description:
Disgusted by the irresponsible and talkative Honda, serious class representative Mami has been avoiding him. However, even when Mami begins avoiding him even more after a certain incident at the convenience store, Honda is undeterred.
Annoyed by Honda`s overly familiar behavior, Mami complains about him to her new friend Miharu, who suggests they discuss the issue with Honda`s friend Mishima.
Source: crunchyroll
